page.title: 05HOUSING IN BLOFIELD HEATH
page.content: In the Blofield Heath area we studied 135 homes. Of these, the majority were bungalows or chalets. Most of these were modern, there were very few old houses in the area. Both old and new homes had the same size gardens, which were small. There were no specific parts where the old houses are situated, they are all scattered around. All of them were privately owned. Most of the bungalows were fairly large, often with three bedrroms. The modern homes were built in the ealy 70s, the older houses were built in the 50s after the war. The homes were set out in lines fairly close together. Most of the homes were situated along one road or in cul_de_sacs branching off the main roads.
